item.description:
Fellow drinking buddy, Jennifer Gainey was selected as a WINNER of a Howl at the Moon After-Work Party! She has invited us to join her to enjoy live entertainment, great food, and tons of fun.

Get ready to experience the most unique nightlife experience in the country! Howl at the Moon is the World’s Greatest Rock N’ Roll Dueling Piano Bar. Come sing, dance, and howl the night away as the most versatile and talented musicians perform your favorite songs from the 70's, 80's, 90's, and today on pianos, guitars, and more!

If you RSVP Yes, are at least 21 and arrive between 6 PM and 8 PM you receive:

No cover until 8 PM if you leave and want to reenter after 8 PM you must pay an entry fee of at least $7 and if you arrive after 8 PM you must pay an entry fee of at least $7.

$4 vodka drinks (type of liquor to be named that night)

$4 rum drinks (type of liquor to be named that night)

$3 Beer (type of beer to be named that night)

Complimentary buffet from 6 PM until 8 PM (so get there early so you can have some grub)

AS ALWAYS YOU MUST MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER

If you want to pay for your food and interested in the drink list here are the Howl Food Menu and Howl Drink Menu

Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to create your route by public transit. Aquarium (blue line), Haymarket (green & orange lines), State (orange & blue lines), Government Center (blue & green lines), and South Station (red line & commuter rail) subway stations are no more than a fifteen (15) minute walk away.

Howl at the Moon Party Terms and Conditions: I understand that Howl at the Moon does not reserve or allow guests to hold tables. If you are interested in a guaranteed table, there is special party pricing. I understand that these are the privileges for the date specified only. No rights, privileges or drink offers will apply to this Happy Hour Party other than what is stated in this email. I understand that I will be responsible to notify all my guests of their privileges prior to the party.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Jennifer Gainey's Party and you will get a wrist band that gets you free grub and cheap drinks
item.name: Let's Howl at the Moon Thursday May 26th
